name: gulp-css-rebase
description: Rewrite url references in CSS and copyed CSS assets

scripts.patch: npm version patch && git push origin master --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && git push origin master --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major && git push origin master --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Igor Ognichenko <ognichenko.igor@gmail.com>
